description: Highly skilled software engineer with a Master's degree and two years of experience specializing in full-stack and desktop application development. Committed to creating maintainable solutions that leverage existing code. Committed in crafting user-centered software with a focus on concise, simple, and decoupled code architecture. Proficient in a diverse range of technologies and frameworks. Passionate about delivering high-quality products that meet the needs of end-users while ensuring scalability and efficiency.

certifications.name: CCNA
certifications.description: CCNA 2 : Switching, Routing, and Wireless Essentials
